bill.summary: 10/7/2008--Public Law. (This measure has not been amended since it was since it was introduced. The expanded summary of the House passed version is repeated here.) Drug Endangered Children Act of 2007- Amends the USA PATRIOT Improvement and Reauthorization Act of 2005 to extend the grant program for drug-endangered children through FY2009. Authorizes appropriations for FY2008-FY2009.
